links.name: Rampancy
links.passive1: Consume III: When a nearby enemy dies there is a 100% chance that you will be healed for 25 Health

links.name: Vigor
links.passive1: Consume II: When a nearby enemy dies there is a 50% chance that you will be healed for 15 Health

links.name: Stamina
links.passive1: Defensive Aura II: You and all nearby allies are granted 12 Armor and 17 Magic Resist.
links.passive2: You and all nearby allies have their Armor increased by 8%.

links.name: Protection
links.passive1: Defensive Aura III: You and all nearby allies are granted 16 Armor and 24 Magic Resist.

links.name: Unity
links.passive1: Defensive Aura II: You and all nearby allies are granted 12 Armor and 17 Magic Resist.
links.passive2: You and all nearby allies take 15% less damage from area of effect attacks.

links.name: Fortitude
links.passive1: Defensive Aura 1: You and all nearby allies are granted 8 Armor and 10 Magic Resist

links.name: Glory
links.passive1: Blazing Aura II: Deals 35 (+1.2% of Maximum Health) damage every second to nearby enemies.

links.name: Pride
links.passive1: Blazing Aura I: Deals 35 magical damage every second to nearby enemies

links.name: Rebirth
links.passive1: From the Ashes: Dropping below 30% Health will cause you to recover 30% of Maximum Health over 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

links.name: Creation
links.summary: +250 Health, +25 Health Regen per 5 seconds, +30 Haste, 5% Lifedrain
links.passive1: Vitality Blessing: Increases the effectiveness of Heals, Regen and Lifedrain by 30%

links.name: Growth
links.summary: +210 Health, +25 Health Regen per 5 seconds, +25 Haste

links.name: Glory
links.passive1: Blazing Aura II: Deals 35 (+1.2% of Maximum Health) damage every second to nearby enemies.

links.name: Pride
links.passive1: Blazing Aura I: Deals 35 magical damage every second to nearby enemies.

links.name: Order
links.passive1: Toughness III: Reduces the damage taken from basic attacks by 15%.

links.name: Integrity
links.passive1: Toughness II: Reduces the damage taken from basic attacks by 8%.

links.name: Equilibrium
links.passive1: Wither: Dealing damage will slow the target's attack speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

links.name: Subjugation
links.passive1: Power Lock: Dealing damage reduces all of the damage that target deals by 15% for 3 seconds.

links.name: Hope
links.passive1: Divine Intervention II: Using an ability grants you 30% damage reduction for 3 seconds. this effect has a 8 second cooldown.

links.name: Luck
links.passive1: Divine Intervention I: Using an ability grants you 15% damage reduction for 3 seconds. This effect has a 8 second cooldown.

links.name: Faith
links.passive1: Void III: Every 4 seconds you will gain a shield that absorbs up to 25 magical damage. This effect will continue to stack until the shield reaches a value of 375.

links.name: Conviction
links.passive1: Void II: Every 4 seconds you will gain a shield that absorbs up to 15 magical damage. This effect will continue to stack until the shield reaches a value of 225.

links.name: Hope
links.passive1: Divine Intervention II: Using an ability grants you 30% damage reduction for 3 seconds. this effect has a 8 second cooldown

links.name: Luck
links.passive1: Divine Intervention I: Using an ability grants you 15% damage reduction for 3 seconds. This effect has a 8 second cooldown.

links.name: Oppression
links.passive1: Despair Aura: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced by 15.

links.name: Valor
links.passive1: Diehard II: On taking damage that would drop you below 30% Health, you will first gain a shield that absorbs 350 damage for 5 seconds. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
links.passive2: Last Stand: Grants bonus Power based on missing Health, up to a maximum of 50 Power.

links.name: Stability
links.passive1: Tenacity II: Reduces the duration of disabling effects by 40%.
links.passive2: Unstoppable: The movespeed reduction effect of slows is reduced by 35%

links.name: Momentum
links.passive1: Tenacity II: Reduces the duration of disablign effects by 40%.

links.name: Motion
links.passive1: Tenacity I: Reduces the duration of disabling effects by 25%.

links.name: Oppression
links.passive1: Despair Aura: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced by 15

links.name: Adamance
links.passive1: Diehard II: On taking damage that would drop you below 30% Health, you first gain a shield that aborbs 350 health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
links.passive2: Lockdown: Taking physical damage builds a stack of Lockdown. At 5 stacks Lockdown will activate, reducing any nearby enemies' movespeed by 30% and attack speed by 40% for 3 seconds.

links.name: Valor
links.passive1: Diehard II: On taking dmage that would drop you below 30% Health, you will first gain a shield that absorbs 350 damage for 5 seconds. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
links.passive2: Last Stand: Grants bonus Power based on missing Health, up to a maximum of 50 Power.

links.name: Resolve
links.passive1: Diehard I: On taking damage that would drop you below 30% Health, you will first gain a shield that absorbs 150 damage for 5 seconds. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

links.name: Rage
links.passive1: Guard Crush: Your basic attacks and abilities passively penetrate 40% of your target's defenses.

links.name: Destruction
links.passive1: Guard Break: Increases Defense Penetration by 25.

links.name: Aggression
links.passive1: Guard Crack: Increases Defense Penetration by 15.

links.name: Inevitability
links.passive1: Frost II: Dealing damage will slow the target based on the type of attack used.

links.name: Pursuit
links.passive1: Quick Step: Dealing damage grants a 14% movespeed increase that quickly decays over 2 seconds.
links.passive2: Frost 1: Dealing damage will slow the target based on the type of attack used.

links.name: Control
links.passive1: Frost I: Dealing damage will slow the target based on the type of attack used.

links.name: Hostility
links.passive1: Violence Aura: You and all nearby allies are granted 20 Power and 10 Mastery.

links.name: Pain
links.passive1: Mortal Strike: Dealing damage to an enemy will Mortal Strike them, reducing the effect of Heals, Regen and Lifedrain by 50% for 3 seconds.

links.name: Stability
links.passive1: Tenacity II: Reduces the duration of disabling effects by 40%
links.passive2: Unstoppable: The movespeed reduction effect of slows is reduced by 35%.

links.name: Momentum
links.passive1: Tenacity II: Reduces the duration of disablign effects by 40%.

links.name: Motion
links.passive1: Tenacity I: Reduces the duration of disabling effects by 25%.

links.name: Conquest
links.passive1: Expose Weakness II: Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resistance by 5% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
links.passive2: Aftermath: After using an ability, your next basic attack will deal an additional 50 (+1.0) damage. This effect has a 3 second cooldown.

links.name: Ruin
links.passive1: Expose Weakness II: Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resist by 5% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
links.passive2: Giant Killer: Basic attacks deal 4% of the target's maximum Health as bonus physical damage (max: 240 bonus damage vs minions and creatures).

links.name: Decay
links.passive1: Expose Weakness II: Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resist by 5% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
links.passive2: Spririt Burn: Dealing damage with abilites will deal 4% of the target's maximum Health over 4 seconds as magical damage. This damage is doubled for single target abilities (max: 320 total damage vs minions and creatures).

links.name: Abolition
links.passive1: Expose Weakness I: Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resist by 3% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

links.name: Fate
links.passive1: Collateral Damage: Dealing damage with basic attacks fires projectiles at up to 3 enemies near the target, each dealing 60% of your basic attack damage as basic attack damage.

links.name: Insight
links.passive1: Eagle Eye: Increases basic attack range by 25%
links.passive2: Netherbind: Basic attacks against enemy shapers will root them for 0.8 seconds. This effect has a 15 second cooldown. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown by 1 second.

links.name: Progress
links.passive1: Chain Lightning I: Dealing damage causes a chain lightning, dealing 50 magical damage to up to 4 nearby enemies. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.
links.passive2: Iron Will: Dealing damage grants 5 Magic Resist for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

links.name: Chaos
links.passive1: Chain Lightning II: Dealing damage causes a chain lightning, dealing 100 (+10% of the damage dealt) as magical damage to up to 4 nearby enemies. This second has a 6 second cooldown.

links.name: Action
links.passive1: Expose Weakness I: Dealing damage reduces the target's Armor or Magic Resist by 3% for 4 seconds, depending on if the damage dealt was physical or magical. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

links.name: Ambition
links.passive1: Grants bonus Haste and Lifedrain based on your missing health, up to a maximum of 30 Haste and 10% Lifedrain.

links.name: Desire
links.passive1: Desperate Thirst 1: Grants bonus Haste and Lifedrain based on your missing health, up to a maximum of 15 Haste and 5% Lifedrain

links.name: Ambition
links.passive1: Grants bonus Haste and Lifedrain based on your missing health, up to a maximum of 30 Haste and 10% Lifedrain.

links.name: Voracity
links.passive1: Rising Hunger: Dealing damage grants 4 Power and 1% Lifedrain. This effect stacks up to 5 times for maximum bonus of 20 Power and 5% Lifedrain.

links.name: Assimilation
links.passive1: Undying Storm: After scoring a kill or an assist on an enemy shaper you are instantly healed for 75 (+0.7) Health.
